Text:
Great download, but the FTV site includes video. Have you got the vids?

http://www.ftvgirls.com/mod2011/hayden.html

Step 1: Go to www.ftvstream.com

Step 2: Find video.

Step 3: Right click thumbnail, select "Copy image location"

Step 4: Paste in address bar.

Step 5: Replace everything after the final '/' with '.mp4'

Step 6: Replace 'thumbs' with 'videos'.
By the way, that's losing some people money, so it's definitely not an ad.

"Step 1: Go to www.ftvstream.com

Step 5: Replace everything after the final '/' with '.mp4'
Step 6: Replace 'thumbs' with 'videos'."
